messages.message: Hey folks. I uploaded a driver’s license to aihub.dev.instabase.com (http://aihub.dev.instabase.com) (build) and got the following error.  I can’t select the error b/c if I move my mouse over the popup, the error dialog disappears. Also, we shouldn’t be surfacing stacktrack errors.
@Arjun is this already covered by one of your tickets for improving error states?
Hiding the stack trace error is. Hovering over the tooltip isn’t but that’s an easy fix if that’s something we want to be doing
Also, if put my mouse over the :exclamation: , it would cause the entire error message to flicker.

i thought we fixed hovering over the tooltip content in Pollen a long time ago, but i may be wrong - i’ll open an issue in Pollen since i can reproduce this in the Pollen storybook

the flickering is a different issue, i haven’t seen that one :eyes:
It’s a prop that has to get passed into the tooltip @Serena. I think it’s `hoverOnContent` or something like that
